info.title: REVENUE HUB
info.description: Below is the API endpoint for the Revenue Hub

post.description: This allow the staff to login to there account.

message.example: ensure that all required filed are properly filled

post.description: This allow the staff to create new password to  login to there account

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: staff password token send to the email

get.summary: Get paginated list of demand notices

X-Pagination-From.description: Starting item number of the current page (starts at 1)

X-Pagination-To.description: Ending item number of the current page

property_id.description: ID of the property associated with the demand notice

parameters.name: demandNoticeId
parameters.description: ID of the demand notice to retrieve

parameters.name: demandNoticeId
parameters.description: ID of the demand notice to update

property_id.description: ID of the property associated with the demand notice

arrears_amount.description: Arrears amount of the demand notice

parameters.name: demandNoticeId
parameters.description: ID of the demand notice to delete

post.description: This endpoint allows users to request a password reset link by providing their email address.

200.description: We have emailed your password reset link

status.description: Message indicating the status of the reset password link sent.

parameters.name: paymentId
parameters.description: ID of the payment to view

get.summary: Generate an account number for a demand notice

parameters.name: propertyPID
parameters.description: PID of the property to generate an account number for

post.description: This allow staff admin to add new property details

put.description: This allow staff admin to update property details

delete.description: This allow staff admin to delete property

post.description: Returns various statistics and totals for a specific year, including total payments, demand notices, properties, and users.

parameters.name: date_filter
parameters.description: Optional. The year for which to retrieve data. Defaults to the current year if not provided.

post.description: This allow the MD to create new staff member

put.description: This allow staff member to update their details

message.example: Credential error: You are not authorize

delete.description: This allow staff admin to delete staff

id.description: The ID of the demand notice

payments.description: all the payments associated with the demand notice

amount.description: The amount of the demand notice

arrears_amount.description: The arrears amount of the demand notice

penalty.description: The penalty of the demand notice

status.description: The status of the demand notice

date_created.description: The date when the demand notice was created
